description: This file defines the ProfileService class which implements user profile-related operations such as retrieving, updating, and searching user profiles within the application.

classes.name: ProfileService
classes.description: A service class managing user profile operations, including retrieving, updating, and searching profiles.

methods.name: GetMyProfileAsync
methods.description: Retrieves the profile of the specified user by ID.

methods.name: UpdateMyProfileAsync
methods.description: Updates the profile details of the specified user.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Fetches a user profile by user ID, returning null if not found.

methods.name: SearchAsync
methods.description: Searches users based on a query string, returns a list of user summaries.

methods.name: Map
methods.description: Maps a User entity to a ProfileResponse DTO.
